message: Abbreviation in name 'TsFileWriteToHDFS' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
Local variable name 'dPoint1' must match pattern '^[a-z]([a-z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9]*)?$'.
Local variable name 'dPoint2' must match pattern '^[a-z]([a-z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9]*)?$'.
Local variable name 'dPoint3' must match pattern '^[a-z]([a-z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9]*)?$'.
